title: Clarity emerges on gun reform debate; Shaken faith among Georgia voters
description: Chuck recaps this week's special edition of Meet the Press and Carrie Dann shares her number of the week: In November's election, 10 percent of Trump voters in Georgia said that they were not confident that the state's votes would be counted accurately.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Chuck recaps this week's special edition of Meet the Press and Carrie Dann shares her number of the week: In November's election, 10 percent of Trump voters in Georgia said that they were not confident that the state's votes would be counted accurately.
